META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS - an e-decisionmaking platform for communities.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS enables participative discussion and voting for groups, when getting together offline or online at the same time is not an option.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: e-decisionmaking, e-governance, e-democracy, democracy, direct democracy, liquid democracy
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_SPAM: Contains spam or is unrelated to topic

PARTNERS_CONSENT.HEADING: {{website}} would like to access following data from Your account:
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_PROFILE: View and edit Your Citizen OS profile - name, company, email, picture.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_TOPICS: View and edit Your Citizen OS public Topics and Topics created via the {{website}} website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_VOTES: View and edit Your Citizen OS Votes in public Topics and Topics created via the {{website}} website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_GROUPS: View and edit your Citizen OS groups.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_POLICY: {{website}} will use this information in accordance with their respective terms of service and privacy policies.

PARTNERS_LOGIN.HEADING: {{website}} works together with Citizen OS to offer you a great experience. If you want to use the platform to its fullest, please login to Citizen OS or register.

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_EDIT: You are now in edit mode. You can add text or make changes to it. All changes are automatically saved.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_VOTE: This topic is being voted on, editing is no longer possible!
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW: Looks like your voting process resulted in a draw.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes having several winning options is a good thing, but there are times, when you just really need one clear winner.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: Here's what you could do now:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: It might be possible to solve this offline - for example, a co-located team could flip a coin between the two winning options. Also, if you had votes going to non-winning options, we suggest you run another vote between the two previously winning options only. This time, you could pre-determine a tie-breaker in case you have another draw: a coin flip, a default winning option (usually status quo wins in a draw), a person whose vote is decisive etc.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: How is the decision being put into practice?
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote requires an ID-card or Mobiil-ID signing.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This document needs to be signed with an ID-card or Mobiil-ID to be registered. You cannot vote unless you identify yourself.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your mind and your vote by choosing another option.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: Everyone has cast their votes. You can download the full document here.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED_EXPIRED: Votes have now been cast. Please send topic to follow-up, then return here to download voting results.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: ID-CARD- OR MOBILE SIGNING IS REQUIRED
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: ALLOW USERS TO PASS ON THEIR VOTING RIGHT.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: When eID is the chosen method of voting, delegation is not allowed.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_HAS_BEEN_DELETED_BY: This argument has been deleted by user {{usersFullName}}

TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_REPLY_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: This reply was found inappropriate by user {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Explain and prove your statement here...
TOPICS_TOPICID.LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Sorry, we cannot show you the social mentions as there is no hashtag defined for this Topic. Users with editor permissions can add the hashtag to fetch social mentions.

Phone SIM application error. Try again. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
Your certificate has been revoked. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_AUTH_MOBILE_INIT_4002: Incorrect phone number and/or personal identification code. Phone number has to include the country code.
Mobiil-ID functionality not supported. Please double check phone number and/or id code.
Your certificate has been suspended or revoked. Please contact your service provider.

MSG_ERROR_POST_API_USERS_TOPICS_COMMENTS: Statement text can be 1 to 2048 characters long.
Main statement can be 1 to 128 characters long.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_TOPICS_COMMENTS_REPOR: Explanation text can be 1 to 2048 characters long.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_TOPICS_REPORTS_40000_: Explanation text can be 1 to 2048 characters long.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_TOPICS_REPORTS_REVIEW: Explanation text can be 10 to 4000 characters.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_TOPICS_COMMENTS_REPOR: Report has become invalid, as the argument has been updated after the report.
MSG_ERROR_GET_API_TOPICS_VOTES_STATUS_40: You have cancelled the signing flow and your vote was not counted.
The signing request has expired. To vote, please start over.
The signature is invalid. Your vote was not counted.
MSG_ERROR_GET_API_TOPICS_VOTES_STATUS_50: DigiDoc Service error. Please try again, if the problem persist contact customer support.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_USERS_TOPICS_VOTES_40: Personal identification code (PID) is already connected to another user account. Signing votes with the same PID from different user accounts is not allowed.
Your user account is already connected to another personal identification code (PID). We don't allow voting from the same account with different PID-s.
MSG_ERROR_GET_API_USERS_TOPICS_INVITES_U: Sorry, the invite to a topic has been deleted.
Oops! This invitation has expired. We apologize for the inconvenience. You may try requesting access to this topic again.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_USER_CANCEL: You have cancelled the login flow.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_CERTIFICATES: No card in reader. Check if the ID-card is inserted correctly into the reader. New ID-cards have a chip on the back side of the card.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_IMPLEMENTATION: Digital signing support is not installed. Please visit installer.id.ee website to install the support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_TECHNICAL_ERROR: Something went wrong in our system. We're very sorry! Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_PUT_API_USERS_GROUPS_MEMBERS_U: Cannot revoke admin permissions from the last admin member in the Group. Assign new admin to change permissions of the current User.
MSG_ERROR_DELETE_API_USERS_GROUPS_MEMBER: You cannot leave this Group as you are the last admin user of this Group. Please assign a new admin to leave.
MSG_ERROR_DELETE_API_USERS_TOPICS_MEMBER: You cannot delete the last user with admin permissions. Assign a new admin to delete the user.
MSG_ERROR_PUT_API_USERS_TOPICS_MEMBERS_U: You cannot remove admin permissions from the last admin user. Please assign admin permissions to another user to change the permissions of the current one.
MSG_ERROR_40300: You don't have permissions to complete the operation.
MSG_ERROR_50000: Something went wrong in our system. We're very sorry! Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_NETWORK_PROBLEMS: Network issues, please check your internet connection.
MSG_ERROR_ATTACHMENT_SIZE_OVER_LIMIT: Attachment is too big! Maximum allowed size is 50MB.
MSG_ERROR_PASSWORD_MISMATCH: Password does not match the confirmed password.
